transmissions.message: aircraft crash reported at Fuel Area, activate emergency plan, restrict movements adjacent Fuel Area.
restriction active, responders will be routed via Service Road ONE, report if additional closures required.
at Medical Bay, request clearance to proceed via Service Road ONE and cross Taxiway ALPHA to Fuel Area for aircraft crash response.
proceed Service Road ONE, hold short Taxiway ALPHA at holding point, report holding.
holding short Taxiway ALPHA.
at AES Station, request clearance to proceed to Fuel Area for fire cover and scene protection.
proceed Service Road ONE, hold short Taxiway ALPHA, report holding.
holding short Taxiway ALPHA.
cross Taxiway ALPHA now, expedite, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway ALPHA now, expediting to Fuel Area, will report vacated.
crossing Taxiway ALPHA now, expediting to Fuel Area, will report vacated.
cordon established around Fuel Area access, crowd control in place, access restricted to responders only.
on-scene Fuel Area, medical assessment ongoing, will report casualty status.
on-scene Fuel Area, fire cover established, standing by.
at Station South, request clearance to proceed via Service Road TWO and cross Taxiway BRAVO to Hangar THREE for personnel fainted after landing.
proceed Service Road TWO, hold short Taxiway BRAVO, report holding.
holding short Taxiway BRAVO.
crowd forming at Hangar THREE access, moving personnel back, keeping route open for ambulance.
cross Taxiway BRAVO now, expedite, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway BRAVO now, expediting to Hangar THREE, will report vacated.
on-scene Hangar THREE, patient conscious, assessment in progress, will advise if hospital transport required.
confirm if additional medical support required, maintain updates.
aircraft explosion reported Airfield East, close affected taxi routes and maintain sterile access for responders.
restrictions active Airfield East boundary, routing responders via Perimeter Track.
at AES Station, request clearance to proceed via Perimeter Track and cross Taxiway CHARLIE to Airfield East for fire response.
proceed Perimeter Track, hold short Taxiway CHARLIE, report holding.
holding short Taxiway CHARLIE.
at Fire Station area, request clearance to proceed via Perimeter Track and cross Taxiway CHARLIE to Airfield East for casualty response.
proceed Perimeter Track, hold short Taxiway CHARLIE, report holding.
holding short Taxiway CHARLIE.
cross Taxiway CHARLIE now, expedite, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway CHARLIE now, expediting to Airfield East, will report vacated.
crossing Taxiway CHARLIE now, expediting to Airfield East, will report vacated.
cordon established Airfield East, access restricted, perimeter secured.
on-scene Airfield East, fire cover established, scene risk managed, standing by.
on-scene Airfield East, medical response in progress, will report evacuation.
at Gate BRAVO, request clearance to proceed via Service Road ONE and cross Taxiway DELTA to Perimeter Road for vehicle collision.
proceed Service Road ONE, hold short Taxiway DELTA, report holding.
holding short Taxiway DELTA.
at Perimeter Road, collision scene secured, traffic stopped, request ambulance access lane maintained.
cross Taxiway DELTA now, expedite, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway DELTA now, expediting to Perimeter Road, will report vacated.
debris clearance team enroute, will coordinate safe access once ambulance completes loading.
on-scene, patient assessment in progress, will advise transport requirement.
at Medical Bay, request clearance to proceed via Service Road THREE and cross Taxiway ECHO to Stand FIVE for personnel nauseous midflight.
proceed Service Road THREE, hold short Taxiway ECHO, report holding.
holding short Taxiway ECHO.
cross Taxiway ECHO now, proceed Stand FIVE, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway ECHO now, proceeding Stand FIVE, will report vacated.
confirm if hospital transport required on arrival, bay available.
enroute Stand FIVE, will update after assessment.
on-scene Stand FIVE, patient stable, escorting to Medical Centre for observation.
at Barracks, request movement clearance to Airbase Hospital for domestic casualty transport, route requires crossing Taxiway FOXTROT at POINT NOVEMBER.
proceed Perimeter Track, hold short Taxiway FOXTROT at POINT NOVEMBER, report holding.
holding short Taxiway FOXTROT at POINT NOVEMBER.
stairwell secured, route clear to casualty location, guide in on arrival.
cross Taxiway FOXTROT now, expedite, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway FOXTROT now, proceeding Airbase Hospital, will report vacated.
enroute, one patient stable, ETA three minutes, request bay assignment.
Bay ONE assigned, reception team standing by.
unintentional weapon discharge reported at Training Area KILO, one injured, scene secured, request ambulance and movement restriction at access lane.
restriction active at Training Area KILO access, confirm safe route for ambulance.
request clearance to proceed to Training Area KILO for medical response, advise hold points.
proceed via Service Road TWO, hold short Taxiway DELTA, report holding.
holding short Taxiway DELTA.
cross Taxiway DELTA now, proceed Training Area KILO, report taxiway vacated.
crossing Taxiway DELTA now, proceeding Training Area KILO, will report vacated.
weapon made safe, perimeter held, guide you to casualty.
departing scene with patient, stable, ETA five minutes.
suspected food poisoning reported at Mess SIERRA, multiple personnel unwell, request clearance to proceed and stage at Mess SIERRA access.
proceed via Perimeter Track, report on-scene and advise if additional ambulances required.
Mess SIERRA access controlled, crowd managed, staging area established for ambulances.
confirm approximate patient count on arrival for triage planning.
on-scene Mess SIERRA, multiple patients, triage starting, will update transport requirements.
request additional BLUECROSS unit for transport rotation, patients stable but require observation.
additional unit being dispatched, maintain updates.
personnel fainted at Admin Block ECHO, request clearance to proceed to Admin Block ECHO for assessment.
proceed via Service Road ONE, report on-scene.
elevator access clear, crowd moved back, guide you to patient.
patient regained consciousness, transporting to Medical Centre for checks, ETA four minutes.
Bay TWO ready.
suspected heart attack at Worksite BRAVO, request priority clearance to Medical Centre, route requires Taxiway ECHO crossing at POINT MIKE.
priority approved, hold short Taxiway ECHO at POINT MIKE, report holding.
escort formed with BLUECROSS 5 at POINT MIKE, request immediate crossing clearance.
cross Taxiway ECHO at POINT MIKE now, expedite, report taxiway vacated.
crossing POINT MIKE now with BLUECROSS 5, expediting, will report vacated.
enroute, priority patient, ETA two minutes, request Bay ONE and team ready.
Bay ONE ready, team standing by.
drone sighted near Restricted Area ALPHA adjacent Taxiway BRAVO, request immediate movement restriction in affected segment.
restriction active on Taxiway BRAVO segment adjacent Restricted Area ALPHA, keep this station advised.
proceed intercept, maintain perimeter safety, report drone location updates.
moving to intercept, perimeter being expanded, will report updates.
drone no longer in visual, area being swept, request restriction remain until sweep complete.
restriction remains active, report all clear for lift.
sweep complete, no drone sighted, request lift restriction.
restriction lifted, normal movement resumed.
suspicious person taking photos near Perimeter Fence SECTOR TWO, request clearance to proceed and hold traffic on adjacent service lane.
adjacent service lane restricted for your operation, proceed and report outcome.
contact made with subject, verifying identity, will advise.
subject identified, escorted out of restricted zone, incident logged.
aggressive dog reported near Gate DELTA, potential breach indicator, request restriction of gate access and support.
Gate DELTA access restricted, proceed to contain and assess breach indicators.
gate hardware inspection team can attend if damage confirmed, advise status.
gate checked, no damage observed, request standby for inspection of fence segment.
area stabilized, fence line check ongoing, will report completion.
restricted door damaged at Facility HOTEL, request immediate restriction of access and STALKER support for repairs.
access restricted, STALKER tasked, report when repair complete.
enroute Facility HOTEL to secure and repair door, estimate one-five minutes.
facility perimeter secured, awaiting STALKER repair, will report when restored.
door secured and repaired, access can be restored on your confirmation.
repairs complete, request lift restriction.
restriction lifted, normal access resumed.
report loud bang near Warehouse Area INDIA, possible security incident, request movement restriction and support.
Warehouse Area INDIA access restricted, proceed investigate and report.
standby for potential medical response near Warehouse Area INDIA, advise if required.
standby at safe staging point, remain available.
area searched, no injured personnel found, investigating source, will update.
incident resolved, request lift restriction.
restriction lifted, normal movement resumed.
at Maintenance Depot, request clearance to proceed via Service Road TWO and enter work zone near Runway TWO NINER edge for pothole repairs.
cleared to proceed via Service Road TWO, hold short Taxiway INDIA, report holding.
holding short Taxiway INDIA.
cross Taxiway INDIA now, proceed to Runway TWO NINER edge work zone, remain on shoulder, report on-site.
crossing Taxiway INDIA now, proceeding to work zone, will report on-site.
security escort established around work zone, access controlled.
on-site, repairs commencing, estimate two-zero minutes.
work complete, request clearance to vacate via same route.
vacate via same route, report clear of manoeuvring area.
at Apron Access POINT DELTA, request clearance to enter manoeuvring area for edge lighting repair near Taxiway BRAVO.
cleared via Taxiway BRAVO shoulder only, remain clear of centreline, report on-site.
on-site Taxiway BRAVO edge, lighting repair in progress, estimate one-five minutes.
advise when complete and ready to vacate.
work complete, vacating, will report clear.
clear of manoeuvring area.

scenarios.title: Runway repair after incident (Runway ZERO TWO)

transmissions.message: runway incident resolved, request STALKER entry for runway repair and inspection, maintain runway closure until declared serviceable.
runway remains closed, STALKER will be routed and controlled, advise required work zones.
request clearance to enter Runway ZERO TWO via Taxiway ALPHA for surface inspection and repair tasks.
cleared to enter Runway ZERO TWO via Taxiway ALPHA, proceed to midpoint, report on-scene and keep movement controlled.
salvage reposition complete, runway debris lane available for STALKER work.
on-scene Runway ZERO TWO midpoint, inspection ongoing, repairs commencing, will advise completion.
repairs complete, runway surface checked, request runway reopening on your confirmation.
STALKER reports runway serviceable, confirm reopen authority.
reopen approved, continue monitoring and log completion.
Runway ZERO TWO reopened, normal operations resumed.
structural damage reported near Apron WEST and taxi route, request immediate shutdown of affected areas for assessment.
suspend movements near Apron WEST and adjacent taxi routes, establish safety cordon with LOGIC.
suspension active for Apron WEST sector, advise when restrictions can be adjusted.
cordon established, access restricted, crowd moved back.
assessment ongoing, multiple defects identified, repairs required, estimate to follow.
maintain suspension until STALKER declares safe, prepare alternate routing if available.
unauthorized person sighted on airfield near Taxiway CHARLIE boundary, request immediate security response and temporary restriction.
restriction active at Taxiway CHARLIE boundary segment, LOGIC responding, maintain visual and report person movement.
responding to location now, will intercept and escort off airfield.
available to support cordon and keep routes clear, advise tasking.
proceed to Service Road adjacent Taxiway CHARLIE, establish visual cordon, remain clear of manoeuvring area, report established.
person removed from airfield, area swept, request lift restriction.
restriction lifted, normal movement resumed.
airfield clear from my position.
